title: Complete React & Next.js Development Bootcamp
description: Master modern React with hooks, state management, and Next.js for building scalable full-stack applications with server-side rendering and API routes.

title: JavaScript Fundamentals to Advanced ES6+
description: Learn JavaScript from basics to advanced concepts including async/await, promises, closures, and modern ES6+ features for professional web development.

title: TypeScript for Modern Web Applications
description: Build type-safe applications with TypeScript, covering interfaces, generics, decorators, and integration with React and Node.js frameworks.

title: Responsive Web Design with CSS & Tailwind
description: Create beautiful, mobile-first responsive layouts using modern CSS techniques, Flexbox, Grid, and Tailwind CSS utility framework.

title: Full-Stack MERN Development with MongoDB
description: Build complete web applications using MongoDB, Express, React, and Node.js with authentication, REST APIs, and database management.

title: Frontend Performance & Web Optimization
description: Optimize web applications for speed and performance with code splitting, lazy loading, caching strategies, and Core Web Vitals improvement.
